Confirmatory factor analysis of ordinal items with WLSMV estimation

cfa_wlsmv.Rd

Fits a one-factor CFA model with uncorrelated errors to the polychoric correlations of the items with WLSMV estimation. The function is a wrapper for the cfa() function of the lavaan package.

Usage

cfa_wlsmv(x)

Arguments

x

A data frame containing the items to be analysed

Value

The output is a list containing the results of the analysis.

Examples


cfa_wlsmv(work_stress[1:9])
#> For constructs with categorical indicators, Zumbo et al.`s (2007) "ordinal alpha" is calculated in addition to the standard alpha, which treats ordinal variables as numeric. See Chalmers (2018) for a critique of "alpha.ord" and the response by Zumbo & Kroc (2019). Likewise, average variance extracted is calculated from polychoric (polyserial) not Pearson correlations.
